altername_name: Stunt Flyer: Hero of the Skies
name: Kid Adventures: Sky Captain
overview: Kid Adventures: Sky Captain includes 40 exhilarating missions from sky racing, stunt flying, target shooting and treasure hunting. Players will also have the option of inviting a friend to the cockpit and playing cooperatively in any of the missions or head-to-head in multiplayer mode and can unlock several flying machines including a jet plane and UFO. Kid Adventures: Sky Captain provides the chance for players to improve their flight skills, scores and rank, and is fun for the entire family to enjoy!
